tool.name: Sanntis biosynthetic gene clusters

param.name: input_interpro
param.label: Input the TSV file from InterProScan
param.help: Before using this tool you need to retrieve the right data by using the InterProScan tool

param.name: input_genbank
param.label: Input a Genbank .gb file
param.help: It needs to have the right structure and fit the protein fasta file used in InterProScan

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
SMBGC Annotation using Neural Networks Trained on Interpro Signatures Tool for identifying biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) in genomic & metagenomic data
.....
**Input** - A tsv file coming from InterProScan tool from which you can retrieve the right data. - The right Genbank file with the right structure that fits the protein fasta file used to run InterProScan tool
**Output** - A Gff3 file
